channel.title: Problem with bridges
channel.description:
hi dear members,
i use bridges with Whonix because Tor is blocked, and i can easily connect to Tor most of time. i choose obfs4 bridge option and no problem. however, whatever i try, it occasionally does not connect to Tor. when it happens, i restart again and again; it may barely connect. maybe 1/20. i have no idea what the issue is. at least not due to firewall.
this log is from sys-whonix time synchronisation monitor. it sometimes gives that kind of an output (providing "a bridge i know" doesn't help either):
[notice] Ignoring directory request, since no bridge nodes are available yet. [notice] Ignoring directory request, since no bridge nodes are available yet. [notice] New control connection opened. [notice] New control connection opened. ...
and it sometimes gives that kind of an output:
[warn] Proxy Client: unable to connect OR connection (handshaking (proxy)) with 109.105.109.147:13764 ID=tqkUpY5NwlK1cMA8bJ1pqtKv4nLgp8144wMF/Tpem9A RSA_ID=BBB28DF0F201E706BE564EFE690FE9577DD8386D ("general SOCKS server failure")
[warn] Proxy Client: unable to connect OR connection (handshaking (proxy)) with 37.218.245.14:38224 ID=uOeNDAD+RKtd3LoscAdHmbtq6Y9j2sRh9isHkKussGM RSA_ID=D9A82D2F9C2F65A18407B1D2B764F130847F8B5D ("general SOCKS server failure")
[warn] Proxy Client: unable to connect OR connection (handshaking (proxy)) with 109.105.109.165:10527 ID=2O21O68r2NDN3KL4yHjqTLUmT34fD4Unp6iznNTFwEM RSA_ID=8DFCD8FB3285E855F5A55EDDA35696C743ABFC4E ("general SOCKS server failure")
can someone help me? should i wait? because this happens once in a while for a few days, but then fixes itself unless i do fix it unintentionally.

item.title: Problem with bridges
item.dc:creator: whonix_who
item.description:
hi dear members,

i use bridges with Whonix because Tor is blocked, and i can easily connect to Tor most of time. i choose obfs4 bridge option and no problem. however, whatever i try, it occasionally does not connect to Tor. when it happens, i restart again and again; it may barely connect. maybe 1/20. i have no idea what the issue is. at least not due to firewall.

this log is from sys-whonix time synchronisation monitor. it sometimes gives that kind of an output (providing “a bridge i know” doesn’t help either):

[notice] Ignoring directory request, since no bridge nodes are available yet.
[notice] Ignoring directory request, since no bridge nodes are available yet.
[notice] New control connection opened.
[notice] New control connection opened.
…

and it sometimes gives that kind of an output:

[warn] Proxy Client: unable to connect OR connection (handshaking (proxy)) with 109.105.109.147:13764 ID=tqkUpY5NwlK1cMA8bJ1pqtKv4nLgp8144wMF/Tpem9A RSA_ID=BBB28DF0F201E706BE564EFE690FE9577DD8386D (“general SOCKS server failure”)

[warn] Proxy Client: unable to connect OR connection (handshaking (proxy)) with 37.218.245.14:38224 ID=uOeNDAD+RKtd3LoscAdHmbtq6Y9j2sRh9isHkKussGM RSA_ID=D9A82D2F9C2F65A18407B1D2B764F130847F8B5D (“general SOCKS server failure”)

[warn] Proxy Client: unable to connect OR connection (handshaking (proxy)) with 109.105.109.165:10527 ID=2O21O68r2NDN3KL4yHjqTLUmT34fD4Unp6iznNTFwEM RSA_ID=8DFCD8FB3285E855F5A55EDDA35696C743ABFC4E (“general SOCKS server failure”)

can someone help me? should i wait? because this happens once in a while for a few days, but then fixes itself unless i do fix it unintentionally.
